msbt.message: Yaaay, it's !
Heh heh! Dear ,
Hi there, !
Hey, !
How are you, ?
Thanks for the gift! It made me so happy!
I loved the gift! Thanks so much!
I liked the gift you sent me SO MUCH that I bit it!
Your gift surprised me—it fell out of my mailbox. AHHH!
I got your letter and your gift... 'cause the gift was in the letter!
I'm writing this letter while I eat my favorite snack! (I'll lick the snack crumbs off when I'm done.)
I got hungry writing this and now I forget what I was gonna say, but this sammich I'm eating is tasty!
Letters are real neat, man. You write one, then somebody reads it later and it's like you just said it!
Oh! I wanna ask ya somethin'. Why doesn't your brain fall outta your nose? That's weird, yeah?
Oh! One time I woke up in the forest and I was wearing my shirt like pants. I just remembered that.
Let's hang out soon!
Drop by sometime! I got snacks!
Send me another letter! It's fun!
Sometimes I just say stuff.
Oh! The bugs in the floor say "hi!"
I like pickles! –
I like shrimpies! –
I like coleslaw! –
Macaroni and beans,
I like durian! –
